help-file.title: FOLLOW
help-file.content:
Syntax: follow <character> toggle follow
If two or more players decide to travel in the same direction, why not have one of them lead and the rest follow?
For example:
Fizzwig and Manwich decide to go to visit the Sorcerers Guild. Fizzwig follows Manwich by typing:
'follow manwich'
Manwich then leads the way and Fizzwig just sits back and enjoys the scenery. Once Fizzwig gets tired of following Manwich around, she can just type:
follow me -OR- follow self -OR- follow fizzwig
